adv.js: { let data = await db.m_activity_type.findFirst({ where: { id: Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id")), }, }); local.activity_name = data.type local.assignment = data.has_assignment local.lm = data.has_learning_materials local.render() }} > {children}

action_function.valueBuilt: async()=>{if(confirm("Are you sure to update this data ?")){let a={type:local.activity_name,has_assignment:local.assignment,has_learning_materials:local.lm,updated_date:new Date,updated_by:user.id},t=await db.m_activity_type.update({where:{id:Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"))},data:a});local.assignment=!1,local.activity_name=null,local.lm=!1,local.render(),navigate("/institution/data/activity-type")}};

async()=>{if(confirm("Are you sure to delete this data ?")){let e=await db.m_activity_type.delete({where:{id:Number(new URLSearchParams(window.location.search).get("id"))}});navigate("/institution/data/activity-type")}};
